mapper.select: SELECT A.w_no, A.w_day, A.w_price, A.wor_name, A.wor_major, A.com_name, A.com_major, A.com_address, A.com_phone FROM ( SELECT TB_DW.w_no, TB_DW.w_day, TB_DW.w_price, TB_WORKERS.wor_name, TB_WORKERS.wor_major, TB_COMPANYS.com_name, TB_COMPANYS.com_major, TB_COMPANYS.com_address, TB_COMPANYS.com_phone FROM TB_DW INNER JOIN TB_WORKERS ON TB_DW.wor_name = TB_WORKERS.wor_name INNER JOIN TB_COMPANYS ON TB_DW.com_name = TB_COMPANYS.com_name WHERE TB_COMPANYS.com_name = #{com_name} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 40 ) A ORDER BY w_day ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT TB_DW.w_no, TB_DW.w_day, TB_DW.w_price, TB_WORKERS.wor_name, TB_WORKERS.wor_major, TB_COMPANYS.com_name, TB_COMPANYS.com_major, TB_COMPANYS.com_address, TB_COMPANYS.com_phone FROM TB_DW INNER JOIN TB_WORKERS ON TB_DW.wor_name = TB_WORKERS.wor_name INNER JOIN TB_COMPANYS ON TB_DW.com_name = TB_COMPANYS.com_name ) AS B

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS rnum , TB_DW.w_no, TB_DW.w_day, TB_DW.w_price, TB_WORKERS.wor_name, TB_WORKERS.wor_major, TB_COMPANYS.com_name, TB_COMPANYS.com_major FROM TB_DW INNER JOIN TB_WORKERS ON TB_DW.wor_name = TB_WORKERS.wor_name INNER JOIN TB_COMPANYS ON TB_DW.com_name = TB_COMPANYS.com_name CROSS JOIN (SELECT @rownum := 0 ) AS t
) A WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
